nodes.title: Negative Prompt
widgets_values: lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, text, error, missing fingers, extra digit, fewer digits, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry, artist name, ((extra fingers)), ((mangled fingers)), ugly, duplicates, oversaturated, out of focus, depth of field, focal blur, fake, distorted, amateur, out of frame

The default upscaling is 4x resolution, so it'll create a 4096x4096 from a 1024x1024 generated image. Then we scale it down again to 2048x2048 before saving.

The upscaled width and height can be changed, but sizes outside the 1024x1024 to 4096x4096 range will probably not look as good.

Changing Denoise below 1.0 only makes sense in
img2img mode

SDXL Workflow created by Searge Jul 12, 2023
Requires extension: https://github.com/SeargeDP/SeargeSDXL

Connect:
- top left to right => img2img
- bottom left to right => create a fresh image

When img2img is enabled, the Denoise parameter can be
lowered to a value below 1.0

nodes.title: Secondary Prompt
widgets_values: solo, female, black hair, lightning, landscape, Leonid Afremov

nodes.title: Main Prompt
widgets_values: a light-skinned woman with black hair stands at the edge of the image and shoots lightning bolts from her hand, style of Leonid Afremov
